Name: <color=#2e496b>Heart of the Land</color>
Desc: <color=#333D44>The gentle spring has dawned, and she waits for you in the meadow, where orioles sing and grass flourishes.</color>

Name: <color=#2e496b>Wind Catcher</color>
Desc: <color=#333D44>How will the "resonance" between them shape the ultimate fate of this dimension?</color>

Name: <color=#2e496b>Burial at Sea</color>
Desc: <color=#333D44>Plunge once again into the realm of dreams.</color>

Name: <color=#2e496b>Galactic Dream</color>
Desc: <color=#333D44>Stars and dreams drift with the gentle waves, carrying forth a hazy tomorrow that begins to take shape.</color>

Name: <color=#2e496b>Choice</color>
Desc: <color=#333D44>Onward! The new future is just one step away!</color>

Name: <color=#2e496b>Collapse of the Sand City</color>
Desc: <color=#333D44>The sand table is about to restart again. ——</color>

Name: <color=#2e496b>Breaking the Cocoon</color>
Desc: <color=#333D44>Let's meet somewhere outside the sand table next time. ——</color>
